body:
If anyone cares. I haven't had the time to look into this potential deadlock on regtest (after generating two blocks). The annoying error is related to #5405, so ignore that.

2016-01-08 03:13:42 keypool reserve 17

2016-01-08 03:13:42  pnode->cs_vRecvMsg  net.cpp:1747 (TRY)
2016-01-08 03:13:42  (1) cs_main  main.cpp:4628
2016-01-08 03:13:42  (2) cs_vSend  net.cpp:2461

title: POTENTIAL DEADLOCK FYI
